# [Interview #1115: Firefight Tour - El Cerrito, CA, Entry #54](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1115#54)

#### Question

Who is your favorite Epic?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I would say that Megan is my favorite Epic.
